text: I haven't played a lot of VR games since I don't have a headset (yet), but I did try this game at a friend's house and had an absolute blast. I was actually sweating by the end since you have to flail your arms to run. It felt like I was playing a racing game mixed with Mirror's Edge parkour gameplay. The soundtrack by Spencer Kitagawa is top notch, he's definitely on my radar now. This track in particular is awesome and addictive, I first let it play in the background and after a while realized I was really enjoying the mood it creates.
author: SupraDarky

text:
